article.title: koha-enable
article.info:
Koha is the first free software library automation package.
The Koha Community http://koha-community.org/

refnamediv.refpurpose: Enable a Koha instance. New instances are enabled by default. You only need this command if you have previously disabled a site with koha-disable.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Enable a Koha instance. New instances are enabled by default. You only need this command if you have previously disabled a site with koha-disable.
